qas.question: How many nocturnes did Chopin compose?
What is it about the middle of Chopin's nocturnes that increases their drama?
Chopin's nocturnes were more structured than who?
What year did Chopin meet Field?
Which type of Chopin's compositons were difficult for perfomers due to their middle sections?

context: The <a0_0>21<a0_0/> <a4_0>nocturnes<a4_0/> are more structured, and of greater emotional depth, than those of <a2_0>Field<a2_0/> (whom Chopin met in <a3_0>1833<a3_0/>). Many of the Chopin nocturnes have middle sections marked by <a1_0>agitated expression<a1_0/> (and often making very difficult demands on the performer) which heightens their dramatic character.
